content: mittens and hat are worked in the round do not turn after each round close each round with slip_stitch brim and cuff are worked back and forth in row turn after each row mittens are worked bottom-up and hat top-down picot edging is added to decorate transition betweenmitten/cuff and hat/brim finally pompom is added to hat for striped part of mittens and hat change colour every two rounds when joining round wit hss as follows insert hook in first st of round yoh with new colour pull through loop on hook to finish joining slip_stitch and make ch2 of next round with new colour check fit of mittens around wrist by inserting hand through foundation chain if chain is too small circumference can be increased by adding sts in multiples of 4 st counts will increase accordingly for following rounds **gauge** 20 sts and 9 rounds over treble_crochet to measure 10 x 10cm using 3mm hook **sizing in cm** mittens approx 18cm circumference x 23cm high hat approx 54cm circumference x 24cm high excl pompom **list of materials** kaleidoscope combo elise verra materials scheepjes softfun minis colour pack jewel 60% cotton 40% acrylic 12 x 20g/56m contains yarn a 2637 mahogany yarn b 2492 bordeaux yarn c 2534 cyclamen yarn d 2463 purple yarn e 2656 aubergine yarn f 2401 prussian yarn g 2644 lagoon yarn h 2604 aztec yarn i 2643 pine yarn j 2616 pickle yarn k 2635 dijon yarn l 2623 chocolate scheepjes softfun 60% cotton 40% acrylic 50g/140m yarn m 2426 lace x 1 ball 3mm crochet hook 7 5cm pompom maker this pattern is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print from scheepjes stockists
